text: If you prefer to have a clear overview of your travel costs from the beginning, a pre-designed road trip package can be a great option. Since these include your hotel stays and sometimes extras like train rides or local experiences, it’s easier to stick to a budget. Where to stay There’s no shortage of places to stay during a road trip in Switzerland. From boutique hotels and alpine lodges to farm stays and simple guesthouses, you'll find something for every taste and budget. The question is whether you want to plan it yourself – which offers the most flexibility – or go for something already put together. Pre-designed road trips typically include a set number of nights at pre-booked hotels along the route. These are hand-picked for convenience and quality, and you don’t have to spend hours researching or worrying about availability. If that sounds like a better fit for you, you can, once more, browse some of the best options here: Switzerland Travel Centre Road Trips .
